00060 /*
00061 Delayed rectifier potassium current based on
00062 axonal simulation
00063 C.M. Colbert nad E. Pan (1995)
00064 "Ion channel properties underlying axonal action
00065 potential initiation in pyramidal neurons"
00066 Nature Neurosci., Vol. 5, No. 6., p.533-538
00067 with kinetics from
00068 Hoffman, D. A., Magee, J. C., Colbert, C. M. & Johnston, D. (1997)
00069 "K+ channel regulation of signal propagation in
00070  dendrites of hippocampal pyramidal neurons"
00071 Nature, Vol. 387, p. 869-875
00072 
00073 The original potassium's n-gate is not fully specified by
00074 the alpha and beta rate constants but
00075 by a voltage independent time constant tau_n = 1.8 ms.
00076 (i.e. not 1/(\alpha_n + \beta_n))
00077 My Mathematica modelling shows that an equivalent
00078 kinetic model exists which reproduces perfectly the
00079 observed gating without the need of constants and
00080 thus allows for stochastic modelling.
00081 
00082 \warning
00083 */
00084 
00085 
00086 // MAY NOT BE WORKING PROPERLY - RECHECK!
00087 // SINCE RESTING POTENTIAL IS NOT WELL ESTABLISHED
00088 class NTBP_colbert_axonal_potassium_multi_current_o : public NTBP_multi_current_o {
00089 public:
00090 /***   Constructors, Copy/Assignment and Destructor  ***/
00091 NTBP_colbert_axonal_potassium_multi_current_o(NTreal area /* in muMeter^2 */,
00092                                                                                 NTreal density = 8/* num/muMeter^2 */,
00093                                                                                 NTreal channelConductance = 2.0e-8, /* in mSiemens per channel = 13pS */
00094                                                                                 NTreal newVBase = -64.5 /*m mV */
00095                                                                             );
00096 NTBP_colbert_axonal_potassium_multi_current_o(const NTBP_colbert_axonal_potassium_multi_current_o & original);
00097 const NTBP_colbert_axonal_potassium_multi_current_o & operator= (const NTBP_colbert_axonal_potassium_multi_current_o & right);
00098 virtual ~NTBP_colbert_axonal_potassium_multi_current_o();
00099 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00100 NTreal ComputeRateSum() const;
00101 NTreal OpenChannels() const;
00102 NTreal ComputeConductance();
00103 void ComputeRateConstants(NTreal voltage);
00105 NTreal ComputeChannelStateTimeConstant() const;
00108 NTreturn StepCurrent();
00110 NTreal AlphaN( NTreal vM /* in mV */ ) { vM += _vBase(); return 0.555556/(1.0+exp((-30.0-vM)/13.0));}
00111 NTreal BetaN ( NTreal vM /* in mV */ ) { vM += _vBase(); return 0.555556/(1.0+exp(( 30.0+vM)/13.0));}
00113 void ShowParam() const;
00114 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00115 protected:
00116 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00117 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00118 private:
00119 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00120 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00121 NTBPdelayedPotassiumRectifierType type;
00122 static NT_gaussian_rnd_dist_o normalRnd;
00123 static bool initTableLookUp;
00124 static NTreal alphaNvec [15000];
00125 static NTreal betaNvec [15000];
00126 NTreal alphaN;
00127 NTreal betaN;
00128 NTreal n;
00129 NTreal noiseN;
00130 NTreal baseTemp;
00131 };
